summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Sections 24.38.070, 24.46.110, 24.48.100, and 24.50.100 of the Seattle Municipal Code (Sections 13C.51, 16.61, 17.61 and 17A.61, Zoning Ordinance (86300) to exempt floor area used for mechanical equipment from floor area ratio calculations in the BM, CM, CMT and RM-RD Zones.
